sourceUrl.description: Source URL to fetch and parse release notes from. Supports {version} placeholders in URL.

releaseNotesUrl.description: Optional URL to set in the manifest ReleaseNotesUrl field. Supports {version} placeholders in URL.

characterLimit.description: Optional max character limit for parsed HTML release notes.

cleanup.description: Cleanup release notes with AI. Enabled by default for HTML sources.

waitUntil.description: Optional browser wait condition for navigation.

waitForSelector.description: Optional selector to wait for before capturing HTML.

cacheTtl.description: Optional Cloudflare Browser Rendering cache TTL in seconds.

owner.description: GitHub repository owner. Optional when strategy is github-release (defaults to github.owner).

repo.description: GitHub repository name. Optional when strategy is github-release (defaults to github.repo).

tag.description: Tag template for the release notes lookup. Supports {version}.

cleanup.description: Cleanup release notes with AI. Disabled by default for GitHub sources.

versionRemove.description: Substring(s) to strip after auto-leading 'v' removal.
